comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.morsemuseum.org/louis-comfort-tiffany/laurelton-hall has a history of the house andthe blog post at www.oldlongisland.com/2009/02/laurelton-hall.html has some pictures and stimulated comments from lots of people familiar with the location.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for finding these links swanq. The photos of the interior demonstrate how "this sunken garden echoed the octagonal court of the house," according to Sam Watters's notes in the book, Gardens for a Beautiful America (p. 303).
